fields.name: Gold Medal (Passive):
fields.value: On nights when you placed in the top 3, your attacks are astral rampage attacks.

fields.name: Silver Medal (Passive):
fields.value: For each Mafia player who places in the top half of responses, your attack power will increase by +1.0x.

fields.name: Bronze Medal (Passive):
fields.value: If you are the last mafia player alive, your base attack power increases to 1.0x.

fields.name: Poor Sportsmanship:
fields.value: Each evening, before results, target a number of responses based on your score (<50% = 1, 50%+ = 2), and they will receive a 7.5% score deduction.
